about_the_game:
You Can't See!

Step into the world of a blind traveler, where every tap of your guide cane reveals the unseen. You navigate environments that are familiar or distant— home, subway, a bustling street—illuminating objects through touch and memory.

  • Control Your Cane:

    With each step, your cane brings the world to life. Uncover objects that hold meaning, from a humming boombox to the scent of a flowering plant. Each discovery is a small triumph, adding to the rich tapestry of your journey. Every level represents a different part of the day, seamlessly transitioning from one space to another as you go about your daily routine.

  • Collect Memory:

    Collect significant objects, solve tactile-based navigation puzzles, and immerse yourself in an experience designed to replicate the challenge and beauty of moving through the world without sight. Softly scattered particles and subtle sound cues bring objects to focus, making each touch a moment of connection.

  • Explore and Discover:

    This is a game about exploration, adaptation, and finding warmth in the everyday. Through careful design, a rich soundscape, and intuitive mechanics, Blind Touch offers a unique perspective on discovery and perception.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (2nd or 3rd generation, 2.0 GHz or higher) or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450 / Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
